Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class DiceRoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<Die>
      • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.DiceRoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Die>, Collection<Die>
    public class DiceRoller
extends AbstractCollection<Die>
    A dice roller is a collection of dice that can be rolled and the total computed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DiceRoller​(Die... die)
      Construct a dice roller from 1 or more dice.

      Returns an iterator over the dice contained in the roller.

      Calculate the probability that a roll will generate a given value.
      void roll()
      Roll all the dice, generating a new random total.

        public double probability​(int value)
        Calculate the probability that a roll will generate a given value.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • atLeastProbability

        public double atLeastProbability​(int value)

        Parameters:
        value - value that total should be no less than
        Returns:
        probability that the next roll will produce a total at least the given value
